text: “Nde mbarara, gu ntige gumgi vhɨzav taagia khavi ne bun nde suanga. Nde mba Moses khergi buni, nta ana gavar kim, nde nta gangi fhuve? Ana mba buni kherav, mba kha bisaneŋ vhav ne thɨga shi ne neŋgegi. Mba kha bisaneŋ vhav ne thɨgav shim, Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ Moses ga nzuai, ‘Gu Abraham gum, Aisak, Zekop, gu mben Fhe Bakɨme ma.’
